summary: Versatile specialist with strong experience in **technical support**, **analytics**, and **process automation**. Skilled in building efficient systems using **Python**, **PostgreSQL**, **Google Sheets**, and **n8n** to improve workflows and reduce operational load. Proven ability to analyze data, optimize user experience, and lead teams through structured communication and quality control. Combines analytical thinking with a customer-centered approach to deliver measurable results and continuous improvement.

achievements: Automated workflows in Google Sheets and n8n (reduced manual work by 96%)
Developed API scripts for Intercom data
Taught programming to children (Python, Scratch, Lua)
Integrated automation bots to improve efficiency
Managed student onboarding, retention, and parent communication for an online programming school
Handled B2C/B2B sales, support, onboarding, and call quality control
Built Python scripts reducing data processing time by 30%
Automated ticket handling and analytics, increasing support efficiency by 20%
Proposed and implemented 3 hypotheses improving retention metrics

projects.title: Workflow Automation System
projects.description: Built comprehensive automation system using n8n and Python to reduce manual work by 96% in data processing workflows.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed real-time analytics dashboard using PostgreSQL and Google Sheets for tracking user behavior and business metrics.

projects.title: CRM Optimization
projects.description: Implemented and optimized CRM workflows in AmoCRM, improving sales team efficiency and customer retention.
